forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 69, with temperatures falling to around 67 in the afternoon. West southwest wind around 18 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain after 11pm. Mostly clear, with a low around 59. West southwest wind 9 to 18 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

weather_report:
As the sun settles into a comfortable descent over Downtown San Francisco, the city breathes in the clarity of a nearly cloudless sky. Today’s warm embrace of sunshine, hinting at a high of 69 degrees, meets a gentle, invigorating breeze from the west-southwest, nudging the temperature to a mellow fall as it reaches a tranquil evening. The faint possibility of rain looms lightly in the distance, a mere whisper of weather, accompanied by a soft shift in the winds.

With glimpses of bright boulevards and distant silhouettes of the Golden Gate Bridge shimmering against the backdrop, one can’t help but feel the subtle tension in the air—an unfolding chapter in the ever-changing story of this city's maritime climate. There’s wisdom in layering this evening; a light jacket will cushion you against the playful puffs of breeze that accompany potential nightfall fog. The calm afternoon invites casual strolls by the waterfront or perhaps a quiet seat at a local café to witness the transcendence of day into night—moments to savor with a warm drink and lively conversation.
